mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Market leader with 25.56% share in POS systems. Well-known POS option for small cafes, food trucks, and quick-service restaurants. Offers free plan with essential features, making it attractive for new businesses. Strong presence in both retail and restaurant markets.
